description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an independent research experience.
Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis.  Students interested
in independent research may enroll in BIO 297 or BIO 398.  Each course requires a faculty
supervisor, who makes the decision as to which course is appropriate.  Pass/No Pass.  Offered
each semester and during Interim.  Does not count toward biology major requirements. Prerequisite:
